LanguageData.GeneElevationProgress: {0} has moved one step close to being a {1}.
LanguageData.ElevatingPausedNoPower: Building has no power, process has been paused.
LanguageData.NotEnoughFuelPresent: Building needs {0} amount of geneseed capsules to operate on {1}.
LanguageData.GenesCannotBeElevated: {0}'s genes cannot be elevated any more.
LanguageData.InsertPersonGeneseedGenetorDesc: Insert a person into the automated genetor. It will use genetic material from provided geneseed capsules to slowly elevate the pawns genes.
LanguageData.CannotIncreaseEffectiveness: Cannot increase {0}'s potential, it is already maxed.
LanguageData.MayNotHaveGene: Cannot increase {0}'s {1} potential. {0} may not have the {2} gene.
LanguageData.CommandCancelProcedureDesc: Cancel the procedure. The contained person will be ejected.
LanguageData.InsertPersonWarpAdjusterDesc: Insert a person into the device. It will use {0} potential material from provided capsules.
LanguageData.PotentialHarvestKillChance: Chance to kill when harvesting potential.
LanguageData.CheckVEFPatches: Remember to check Vanilla Expanded Framework toggable patches for more settings!
